Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd Street Beach
ShortDescription: Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island: due to Line Cut, near 63rd Street Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island: due to Line Cut, near 63rd Street Beach.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
